Author: ChaosSauces
Text: Congrats on the b/p free streak!   The restrict/drink/binge cycle is so rough. It’s honestly just a horrible feeling. It’s like the ultimate loss of control.   I really implore you to seek treatment/support for alcoholism. AA is free. I know it’s not everyone’s cup of tea but it can at least be somewhere to go that isn’t a bar/a friends.

Author: Doctordoomduck
Text: Congratulations on not purging! That’s a huge step in the right direction and regardless of your recent diet, you should feel proud of that achievement. ❤️❤️❤️
